author: Craig Northacker
content: It is a terrible price that the disabled pay when funding is not made available for them especially with such a noble genesis. It is terrible for everyone – but the disabled take it on the chin far more often. This is a sad day for the world when world leaders are focused on paying off each other or forcing hands in games of chess and spending trillions on weapons systems – that often do not work.
